data.feedback: Excellent Flutter foundation architecture. All file paths verified - filesToModify exist, filesToCreate don't exist. Architecture follows clean architecture with Dart 3 best practices (sealed classes, Result pattern). Stories provide comprehensive coverage with proper dependency ordering. Code examples are clear and follow Flutter conventions.

issues.description: Epic filesToCreate lists 'api_client.dart' but story-4 creates 'dio_client.dart'
Root .env already exists with proper config; story-3 creates assets/.env
issues.impact: Developer should coordinate with existing .env file

suggestions: Consider noting existing .env in root in story-3 description
Add story to modify analysis_options.yaml if specific lint rules needed
